message: I propose we split the money 90/10, with me taking the larger share. This is a fair starting point for negotiation.
Alice, your offer was heavily skewed in your favor. I propose a 60/40 split, recognizing that we are both losing money the longer this goes on.
I'm willing to compromise further, but I need a larger share than 40%. I propose a 55/45 split, which is closer to fair and allows us both to gain something before the money depreciates further.
